title: President Rajapaksa- Face to face in Moscow
content: Onlanka News – By Janaka Alahapperuma – (Pix by: Sudath Silva) Sri Lanka President Mahinda Rajapaksa met his counterpart, President of Russian Federation Dmitry Medvedev in Moscow this afternoon on 8th February. Both leaders discussed issues about security, development, trade and other relevant matters related to both countries at the round table conference. Foreign Minister…
